changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE usr ( id bigint NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, is_active boolean NOT NULL, login varchar(50) UNIQUE NOT NULL, mail varchar(50) UNIQUE NOT NULL , password varchar(60) NOT NULL, user_role varchar(50) NOT NULL, gold integer NOT NULL ); ALTER TABLE usr ADD CONSTRAINT mail_validation CHECK (mail ~* '^[A-Za-z]{1}[a-zA-Z0-9.-_]+@[A-Za-z0-9.-]+[.][A-Za-z]+$');
